il.ac.hit.costmanager.views

Interface IView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CostManagerView

    public interface IView
    This Interface describes CostManagerView class, and it's methods that will help the user "communicate" with the program.
    Author:
    Ziv Hochman, Anzor Torikashvili.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createTransaction(Item item, double updatedBudget)
      Adds the item to the database and updates the wallet balance of the user.
      void init()
      CostManagerView's constructor.

      Sets vm to vm.

      Presents the categories of the user.
      void showCurrencies(java.util.List<Currency> currencyList)
      Presents the currencies of the user.
      void showItems(Item[] items)
      Shows the items of the user.
      void showItemsByDate(java.util.List<Item> itemsByDates)
      Presents the items of the user that are between two dates that the user chose.
      void showMessage(Message message)
      Displays the pop-up message to the user.
      void showPerson(Person person)
      Set up the user details after login for the program.
      void start()
      Prepares the CostManagerView's page for display.

    • Method Detail

      • createTransaction

        void createTransaction(Item item,
                       double updatedBudget)
        Adds the item to the database and updates the wallet balance of the user.
        Parameters:
        item - Contains the item the user wants to insert.
        updatedBudget - Contains the sum that needs to be deducted from the user's wallet balance.

      • init

        void init()
        CostManagerView's constructor.

      • setIViewModel

        void setIViewModel(IViewModel vm)
        Sets vm to vm.
        Parameters:
        vm - The vm of the vm field.

      • showCategories

        void showCategories(java.util.List<Category> categoryList)
        Presents the categories of the user.
        Parameters:
        categoryList - Contains all the categories of the user.

      • showCurrencies

        void showCurrencies(java.util.List<Currency> currencyList)
        Presents the currencies of the user.
        Parameters:
        currencyList - Contains all the currencies of the user.

      • showItems

        void showItems(Item[] items)
        Shows the items of the user.
        Parameters:
        items - Contains the list of items.

      • showItemsByDate

        void showItemsByDate(java.util.List<Item> itemsByDates)
        Presents the items of the user that are between two dates that the user chose.
        Parameters:
        itemsByDates - Contains all the items of the user between two dates that he entered.

      • showMessage

        void showMessage(Message message)
        Displays the pop-up message to the user.
        Parameters:
        message - Contains the message to display to the user in the pop-up.

      • showPerson

        void showPerson(Person person)
        Set up the user details after login for the program.
        Parameters:
        person - Contains the details of the user who just logged in.

      • start

        void start()
        Prepares the CostManagerView's page for display.
